entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
